long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
IG Exporter enables you to extract Instagram followers and followings with a single click and exports them to a CSV file.

üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Features
‚úì Extracts followers from Instagram and exports them to CSV
‚úì Extracts followings from Instagram and exports them to CSV
‚úì Retrieves user profiles, including follower and following counts, post counts, email, phone number, and external URLs, among other details
‚úì Retrieves user profiles from private accounts that follow you or that you follow
‚úì Saves data locally for future access, allowing you to download and continue the extraction process at any time

üìÉ How to Get Started
- Type the Instagram Username or open the extension on the user's profile page where it will autofill the Username
- Choose the Export Type: Followers or Following
- Click the 'Start Exporting' button to begin
- Click 'Export to CSV' once the data extraction is complete

üì¨ Contact
Feel free to reach out to us at jfl913@gmail.com with any questions or suggestions about improving the extension.

üîí Data Privacy
Your data remains on your local machine and is never processed through our servers.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Statement
The IG Follower Export Tool is not officially associated with Instagram, Inc., nor is it endorsed, sponsored, or affiliated with INSTAGRAM or any of its related entities.
long.en,en_AU:
IG Exporter enables you to extract Instagram followers and followings with a single click and exports them to a CSV file.

To decrease the chance of getting banned, the IG Exporter extension takes a break after submitting 100 data requests, and then it will resume exporting data.

üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Features
‚úì Extracts followers from Instagram and exports them to CSV
‚úì Extracts followings from Instagram and exports them to CSV
‚úì Extracts custom users from a .csv file and exports them to CSV
‚úì Retrieves user profiles, including follower and following counts, post counts, email, phone number, and external URLs, among other details
‚úì Retrieves user profiles from private accounts that follow you or that you follow
‚úì Saves data locally for future access, allowing you to download and continue the extraction process at any time


üìÉ How to Get Started

- Choose the Export Type: Followers or Following
- Click the 'Start Exporting' button to begin
- Click 'Export to CSV' once the data extraction is complete

üîí Data Privacy
